column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Suki says : " Oops , wrong tent ! "
#Text=Zuko says : " Sorry , do you need to talk to Sokka , too ? "
#Text=Suki says : " Nope , not me ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Well , hello ... Uh , Zuko !
#Text=She hates me !
#Text=And I do n't know why , but I do care what she thinks of me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Nah , she does n't hate you .
#Text=Katara does n't hate anyone .
#Text=Except maybe some people in the Fire Nation .
#Text=No , I mean , uh , not people who are good , but used to be bad .
#Text=I mean , bad people .
#Text=Fire Nation people who are still bad , who 've never been good and probably wo n't be , ever !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Stop .
#Text=Okay , listen .
#Text=I know this may seem out of nowhere , but I want you to tell me what happened to your mother .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=Why would you want to know that ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Katara mentioned it before when we were imprisoned together in Ba Sing Se , and again just now when she was yelling at me .
#Text=I think somehow she 's connected her anger at that to her anger at me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's not a day I like to remember .
#Text=" Young Katara says : " I 'm going to find Mom !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Many of the warriors had seen the black snow before and they knew what it meant : a Fire Nation raid .
#Text=We were badly outnumbered , but somehow , we managed to drive them off .
#Text=As quickly as they came , they just left .
#Text="
